content: today I want to talk about using a throw away containers for crafting now here's
one I got from my local supermarket and it's the deli section this is from a
Chinese restaurant delivery and you see it's a larger size but these are great
for different uses for your crafting and here's another one this one had a spread
in it okay and you could use this for holding things that you need for
crafting or what I like to use them for is use the top for a pallet for my craft
paint and then you can use the base for putting water in and wash your brushes
off so you've got a ready-made pallet right there and if it gets too pumped up
we can just throw it away here are some other ones I've used four
pallets there make great pallets and if they get too gunked-up like I said you
just pitch them it's no cost to you now another great benefit ease is to hold
your crap items so here's some sticks that I put in this one you can use
larger ones for different size materials and those work great so these are these
are really fantastic and just slide show you the super cheap ways you can use
reuse containers instead of throwing them in the trash
